topic.title: OUTCOME OF ASSESSMENT UP TO AND INCLUDING CYTOLOGY AND OR CORE BIOPSY REFERRED FOR CYTOLOGY AND OR CORE BIOPSY TOTAL
topic.shortdesc: OUTCOME OF ASSESSMENT UP TO AND INCLUDING CYTOLOGY AND OR CORE BIOPSY REFERRED FOR CYTOLOGY AND OR CORE BIOPSY TOTAL is the total number of women with:a BREAST SCREENING MAMMOGRAPHY OUTCOME CODE recorded as National Code 'Referred for assessment'a REFERRAL REQUEST for PATHOLOGY INVESTIGATION TYPE FOR BREAST SCREENING recorded as National Code 'NeedleBiopsyfor Cytology (Fine Needle Aspiration or Cytology)' and or 'Needle Biopsyfor Histology (Wide Bore Needle or Core Biopsy)'.
